mapper.select: Select a.ID, -- 아이디 a.TYPE, -- 타입 a.TITLE, -- 제목 a.AUTHOR_NAME, -- 작성자 a.CREATED_AT, -- 작성일자 a.VIEWS, -- 조회수 a.IS_ACTIVE -- 활성화여부 FROM POSTS a Where 1 = 1 And a.TYPE = 'NOTICE' And Upper(a.TITLE) Like '%' || Upper(#{title}) || '%' And Date(a.CREATED_AT) Between #{begDate} And #{endDate} Order By Date(a.CREATED_AT) Desc
Select a.ID, -- 아이디 a.TYPE, -- 타입 a.TITLE, -- 제목 a.AUTHOR_NAME, -- 작성자 a.CREATED_AT, -- 작성일시 a.VIEWS, -- 조회수 a.CONTENT -- 내용 FROM POSTS a Where 1 = 1 And TYPE = 'NOTICE' And a.ID = #{id}
mapper.insert: Insert Into POSTS ( TYPE, TITLE, CONTENT, AUTHOR_NAME, VIEWS, IS_ACTIVE ) Values ( 'NOTICE', #{title}, #{content}, #{authorName}, 0, #{isActive} )
mapper.update: Update POSTS Set TITLE = COALESCE(#{title}, TITLE), CONTENT = COALESCE(#{content}, CONTENT), UPDATED_AT = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP Where 1 = 1 And TYPE = 'NOTICE' And ID = #{id}
mapper.delete: Delete From POSTS Where 1 = 1 And TYPE = 'NOTICE' And ID = #{id}
